summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing charges for shipping services provided on December 21, 2001. It includes information about the account, payment due date, and total charges incurred for the services rendered.

persons.name: Jeff Schan
persons.context: Jeff Schan is listed as the sender associated with the shipping charges on the invoice.

persons.name: Jaffe
persons.context: Jaffe is mentioned as the recipient of the package delivered by FedEx.

connections.description: Jeff Schan is the sender of the package that was delivered to Jaffe.

events.title: Package Shipment
events.description: A package was shipped via FedEx from Jeff Schan to Jaffe.

events.title: Payment Due
events.description: The payment for the shipping invoice is due.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-071-02696, dated January 4, 2002.
Total charges for the shipping services amount to USD 20.99.
The package was picked up on December 21, 2001, and delivered on December 22, 2001.
A fuel surcharge was applied to the shipment.
